hooks.command: FILEPATH=$(echo "$TOOL_INPUT" | grep -o '"file_path":\s*"[^"]*"' | head -1 | sed 's/"file_path":\s*"//;s/"$//'); if [ -n "$FILEPATH" ] && echo "$FILEPATH" | grep -q '\.php$'; then vendor/bin/pint "$FILEPATH" --quiet 2>/dev/null; fi

FILEPATH=$(echo "$TOOL_INPUT" | grep -o '"file_path":\s*"[^"]*"' | head -1 | sed 's/"file_path":\s*"//;s/"$//'); if [ -n "$FILEPATH" ] && echo "$FILEPATH" | grep -qE '\.(tsx?|jsx?|css)$'; then npx prettier --write "$FILEPATH" --log-level silent 2>/dev/null; fi
